bilingual.target: 参考采访内容获取想法。
采访两位同学并做笔记。

bilingual.source: Predict what is talked about in the interview.
bilingual.target: 预测采访中谈论的内容。

bilingual.source: Chen gave an interview to the local newspaper.
bilingual.target: 陈接受了当地报纸的采访。

bilingual.source: You are going to listen to an interview with an astronaut.
bilingual.target: 你将听一段宇航员的采访。

bilingual.source: Work with a friend and interview each other, using your plans.
bilingual.target: 和朋友一起工作，互相采访，使用你的计划。

bilingual.source: The writing is precise even when the spoken interview may not have been.
bilingual.target: 即使口头采访可能不精确，书面表达也很准确。

bilingual.source: Act out the interview between a sports journalist and a member of a dragon boat team.
bilingual.target: 表演一段体育记者与龙舟队成员之间的采访。

list.abstract: Interview（英 [ˈɪntəvjuː]，美 [ˈɪntərvjuː），英语单词，作名词用，为接见；会见；采访。作动词用，为采访；询问；进行面试。短语搭配有job interview（求职面试；就业面试；面试），例句为“I think the interview went very well.（我觉得面试进行得很顺利）”。 Interview名词类近义词有audience，及物动词类近义词有cover、to receive，名词形式为interviewee、interviewer，过去式为interviewed，过去分词为interviewed。

《Interview》是由边赫 执导的剧情 ， 爱情片，李政宰，沈银河参加演出。 《Interview》讲述了Eun-suk（李政宰 饰）正拍摄真人真事记录片的过程中，他访问了许多不同地方的人的爱情故事。一名叫Young-hee（沈银河 饰）的女子吸引住了他。Young-hee希望自己能够成为一名发型师，因此每天她都在发廊里面默默工作。Young-hee的故事勾起了Eun-suk的兴趣，他想对Young-hee有更多的了解。

yingyinNormal.en: I'd rather not, for the sake of this interview.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还是免了，毕竟这是正式采访。

yingyinNormal.en: Listen, I really appreciate your coming all the way to the palace to conduct this interview.
yingyinNormal.zh: 十分感激你大老远来我家做这个采访。

yingyinNormal.en: But it's the truth. You're under the impression this interview's about the truth?
yingyinNormal.zh: 但这是事实。你以为人们只想在采访中听事实吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I need to go do this quick interview. Let me know how it goes with Mitchell.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我有个简单采访要做，米切尔那边的进展回头通知我。

yingyinNormal.en: I gave an interview to the Law Advocate. Just now. I talked about you. Okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我接受了《法律宣扬》的采访，刚结束，我谈到了你好的。

yingyinNormal.en: Jeff was relaxed and funny. He should be getting all of our interview requests.
yingyinNormal.zh: 杰夫很放松，应对自如，接下来的采访应该都会找他了。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sorry. What? The interview is to introduce you. Tell me about being shot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 抱歉，你说什么？这次采访是为了介绍你，跟我讲讲枪击事件。

yingyinNormal.en: Your first joint interview, when your husband was running for state Assembly in '86.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们俩第一次共同接受采访，86年你丈夫竞选州议员时。

yingyinNormal.en: Tomorrow we need to declare. I'll get us a TV interview. After 5. I'll call you back.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们明天要发表声明，我来安排电视采访。5点以后。我一会打给你。

yingyinNormal.en: And even though gun safety legislation to strengthen background checks has been voted down in congress at the time they were doing this interview.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然而，就在他们接受采访的同时，加强背景调查的枪支安全法遭到了国会的投票否决。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, how'd the interview go? It bit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 面试结果怎么样？逊毙了。

yingyinNormal.en: The radio interview you did was spectacular.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在电台访问中的表现太出彩了。

yingyinNormal.en: It was an interview with David and Francine Wheeler.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当时的访谈对象是大卫与法兰欣·威勒夫妇。

yingyinNormal.en: I got an interview. You're kidding. I got an interview. Where? Saks Fifth Avenue. Oh,Rachel!
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们叫我去面试了。你在开玩笑吧？哪儿？第五大道萨克斯哦，瑞秋。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, how did the interview go? Not good. You know, I always feel that way after an interview. I'll bet it went better than you think.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嘿，面试如何? 不妙。你知道吗？我经常这么觉得。我打赌那会比你想得好。

yingyinNormal.en: I haven't been on a job interview in years. I'm really nervous.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我好几年没去面试了，我真的好紧张。

yingyinNormal.en: I had an interview at Dean Witter for an internship and I got it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我去迪安维特公司参加了个实习面试，我被录取了

yingyinNormal.en: No, it does not. And I'm calling a halt to this interview right now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有任何影响，我要求立刻中止此次取证会。

yingyinNormal.en: Wait! I know. I'm going to conduct an interview with myself and post it online.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道啦，做个自访，然后放到网上去。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm so sorry the interview didn't go well. Yeah, you would've been perfect for it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 面试不顺利我也很替你难过。这工作真的很适合你呢。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 采访者；会见者；面试者
n. 被访问者；被接见者；被面试者

word_family.mean: n. 接见；会见；采访；面试；访谈；口试；审问

examination_example.sentence: The results of <highlight>interviews</highlight> are much more biased than what AI does.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 面试的结果比人工智能做的有偏见的多得多。

examination_example.sentence: The success of an applicant should not depend on the few others chosen randomly for <highlight>interview</highlight> during the same day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 申请人的成功不应该取决于在同一天被随机挑选的几个面试者。

examination_example.sentence: He studied the results of 9,323 MBA <highlight>interviews</highlight> conducted by 31 admissions officers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他研究了31名招生官进行的9323次工商管理硕士面试的结果。

examination_example.sentence: The hormone oxytocin increased the amount of eye contact from men toward the interviewer during a brief <highlight>interview</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一次简短的采访中，催产素会增加男性与采访者的眼神交流。

examination_example.sentence: Some of the soldiers Pyle <highlight>interviewed</highlight> portrayed themselves in the film.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Pyle采访的一些士兵在电影中扮演自己。

word_usage.usage: interview作动词时，既可作及物动词，又可作不及物动词。作及物动词时，其后可接名词或者代词，如：interview 8 people for the job

examination_example.sentence_trans: 离职面谈不是强制性的。

examination_example.sentence: He is going to attend a job <highlight>interview</highlight>.
Now you've got me rethinking what I'll disclose in the <highlight>interview</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在你让我重新思考我将在采访中透露的内容。

examination_example.sentence: Her mother was <highlight>interviewed</highlight>, three weeks after her daughter's birth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 女儿出生三周后，她的母亲接受了采访。

word_usage.usage:
interview表“面试”，为可数名词。“为...面试”用interview for sth.表达，“面试官”为interviewer，“参加面试者”为interviewee。
示例：He refused an interview for the job.
他拒绝了这份工作的面试。
"采访某人(关于某事)"用interview sb. (about sth.)表达。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>interviewed</highlight> people who didn't say thank you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们采访了没有说谢谢的人。

examination_example.sentence: At the time of the first <highlight>interview</highlight>, at least one of the partners was over the age of 50.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第一次采访时，夫妻双方中至少有一方年龄超过了50岁。

examination_example.sentence: As for the organization itself, it declined a request for an <highlight>interview</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 至于该组织本身，它拒绝了采访的请求。

v. 解释；说明；阐明；阐释；理解（行为；情绪；行为方式）的特殊含义；口译；表演；呈现；演绎

word_usage.usage: "采访某人(关于某事)"用interview sb. (about sth.)表达。

interview表“面试”，为可数名词。“为...面试”用interview for sth.表达，“面试官”为interviewer，“参加面试者”为interviewee。
示例：He refused an interview for the job.
他拒绝了这份工作的面试。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 采访者；会见者；面试者

word_family.mean: n. 接见；会见；采访；面试；访谈；口试；审问

sense_info_list.en: a meeting of people face to face

examination_example.sentence: "It's a really great experience for kids," said a neighbor in an <highlight>interview</highlight> with the local newspaper.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一位邻居在接受当地报纸采访时说：“这对孩子们来说真是一次很棒的经历。”

examination_example.sentence: During an <highlight>interview</highlight> for one of my books, my interviewer said something I still think about often.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我的一本书的采访中，我的记者说了一些我仍然经常想到的话。

examination_example.sentence: I think the <highlight>interview</highlight> went very well.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我觉得面试进行得很顺利。

examination_example.sentence: It was an unusual <highlight>interview</highlight>, and an unexpected experience as well.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一次不寻常的采访，也是一次意想不到的经历。

examination_example.sentence: I want to especially thank you, Ms. Bertha, for agreeing to this <highlight>interview</highlight> on live television.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我要特别感谢你，伯莎女士，同意接受这次电视直播采访。

examination_example.sentence: We are going to <highlight>interview</highlight> the famous writer next week.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 下周我们将采访这位著名作家。

interview表“面试”，为可数名词。“为...面试”用interview for sth.表达，“面试官”为interviewer，“参加面试者”为interviewee。
